TI

Class BoeBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • TI.BoeBot

  • public class BoeBot
extends java.lang.Object
    The BoeBot class is the main interface to the BoeBot board. It contains methods to do basic GPIO

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BoeBot()

      Stores data on the internal memory of the Raspberry Pi
      static boolean digitalRead(int pin)
      Read the state of a pin.
      static void digitalWrite(int pin, boolean value)
      Will put a pin in output mode, and set the state high if value is true, and low if value is false If this pin is in input mode, will switch to output mode
      static void freqOut(int pin, float frequency, int time)
      Better version of writing a frequency to a pin, for a certain amount of time

      Writes a frequency to a pin, for a certain amount of time

      Turns the tiny status LED on or off

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoeBot

        public BoeBot()

    • Method Detail

      • digitalWrite

        public static void digitalWrite(int pin,
                                boolean value)
        Will put a pin in output mode, and set the state high if value is true, and low if value is false If this pin is in input mode, will switch to output mode
        Parameters:
        pin - the BoeBot pin number
        value - the value to write to this pin. true will set the pin high, low will set the pin low

      • digitalRead

        public static boolean digitalRead(int pin)
        Read the state of a pin. If the pin is high, will return true, otherwise will return false
        Parameters:
        pin - the BoeBot pin number
        Returns:
        the state of the pin, true for high, false for low

      • wait

        public static void wait(int delay)
        Waits for a specific time Warning: this delay is not very accurate
        Parameters:
        delay - the time in milliseconds

      • wait

        public static void wait(int seconds,
                        int micros)
        Waits for a specific time
        Parameters:
        seconds - the number of seconds Warning: if the delay is too short, will use busy waiting
        micros - the number of microseconds

      • uwait

        public static void uwait(int micros)
        Waits for a specific time Warning: if the delay is too short, will use busy waiting
        Parameters:
        micros - the number of microseconds

      • pulseIn

        public static int pulseIn(int pin,
                          boolean value,
                          int timeout)
        Waits for a pulse on a pin
        Parameters:
        pin - the BoeBot pin number
        value - the state to wait for. true to wait for a high pulse, false to wait for a low pulse
        timeout - the timeout to wait for, in microseconds
        Returns:
        Returns the length of the measured pulse, -1 if there was a timeout, and 0 if there was a timeout during the pulse

      • dataStore

        public static void dataStore(int slot,
                             int value)
        Stores data on the internal memory of the Raspberry Pi
        Parameters:
        slot - the dataslot to store information on
        value - the value to store

      • dataRead

        public static int dataRead(int slot)
        Reads data from the internal memory of the Raspberry Pi
        Parameters:
        slot - the dataslot to store information on
        Returns:
        the information in memory

      • freqOut

        public static void freqOut(int pin,
                           int frequency,
                           int time)
        Writes a frequency to a pin, for a certain amount of time
        Parameters:
        pin - the BoeBot pin number
        frequency - the frequency to write, in Hz
        time - the amount of time to write, in milliseconds

      • freqOut

        public static void freqOut(int pin,
                           float frequency,
                           int time)
        Better version of writing a frequency to a pin, for a certain amount of time
        Parameters:
        pin - the BoeBot pin number
        frequency - the frequency to write, in Hz
        time - the amount of time to write, in milliseconds

      • analogRead

        public static int analogRead(int pin)
        Reads an analog value from the 12bit ADC. This method uses single-shot mode, and opens the SPI bus every time it is called.
        Parameters:
        pin - the ADC pin
        Returns:
        the value returned from the ADC (0-4096)

      • rgbShow

        public static void rgbShow()
        Shows the colors set to the NeoPixels on the board

      • rgbSet

        public static void rgbSet(int led,
                          int r,
                          int g,
                          int b)
        Sets the colors of a NeoPixel, but does not show this color. After calling this method for the LEDs you want to change color, call the BoeBot.show() method
        Parameters:
        led - the LED you want to change (0-5)
        r - the value for red (0-255), 0 is off, 255 is completely on
        g - the value for green (0-255), 0 is off, 255 is completely on
        b - the value for blue (0-255), 0 is off, 255 is completely on

      • rgbSet

        public static void rgbSet(int led,
                          java.awt.Color color)
        Sets the colors of a NeoPixel, but does not show this color. After calling this method for the LEDs you want to change color, call the BoeBot.show() method
        Parameters:
        led - the LED you want to change (0-5)
        color - the color of the LED

      • setStatusLed

        public static void setStatusLed(boolean enabled)
        Turns the tiny status LED on or off
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to turn the LED on, false to turn the LED off
